description: Response format specification for structured output. Use this to constrain the model's output to a specific format such as JSON. When not specified, the model returns free-form text.

type.description: The format type. 'text' for free-form text (default), 'json_object' for any valid JSON, 'json_schema' for JSON constrained to a specific schema.

json_schema.description: JSON Schema definition. Required when type is 'json_schema'. Defines the exact structure the model must follow.

name.description: A name for the schema, used for identification (e.g., "person").

schema.description: The JSON Schema that the model's output must conform to.

strict.description: Whether to enforce strict schema validation on the model's output.
